bibliographic-data.invention-title: Generalizing an Optimized Supplier Allocation Plan

abstract.p: Generating an optimized supplier allocation plan includes identifying parts and suppliers associated with an allocation problem, where each supplier can supply at least one part. One or more objective functions are selected. Each objective function has part variables, and each part variable represents a quantity of a part to be procured from a supplier. At least one constraint constraining at least one part variable is received. The one or more objective functions are optimized with respect to the at least one constraint to yield a value for each part variable. A quantity of each part to be procured from at least one supplier is determined according to the values to generate the optimized supplier allocation plan.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: Goods supply planning system for use in business uses server connected to keyboard and monitor and connected to computer data bank with information on suppliers and business constraints

abstract.p: The planning system (10) has a monitor (20) connected to a server (22) containing an object model module (30), a mathematical model module (32) and a solution circuit (34). The server is connected to a data bank (24) containing a supplier information (42-46) module (40). There are modules for variables (47), parameters (48) and target functions (50). A further module (52) carries details of legal (54), trade (56) and other business constraints including supplier delivery times etc. (58).

Das Erzeugen eines optimierten Zulieferer-Zuweisungsplans beinhaltet, dass einem Zuweisungsproblem zugeordnete Teile und Zulieferer identifiziert werden, wobei jeder Zulieferer mindestens ein Teil liefern kann. Eine oder mehrere Zielfunktionen werden ausgewählt. Jede Zielfunktion hat Teilevariablen und jede Teilvariable repräsentiert eine Quantität eines von einem Zulieferer zu beschaffenden Teils. Mindestens eine Einschränkung, die mindestens eine Teilvariable einschränkt, wird empfangen. Die eine oder die mehreren Zielfunktionen werden bezüglich der mindestens einen Einschränkung optimiert, um einen Wert für jede Teilvariable zu erbringen. Eine Quantität eines jeden von mindestens einem Zulieferer zu beschaffenden Teils wird gemäss den Werten bestimmt, um den optimierten Zulieferer-Zuweisungsplan zu erzeugen.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: Generating an optimized supplier allocation plan

abstract.p: Generating an optimized supplier allocation plan includes identifying parts and suppliers associated with an allocation problem, where each supplier can supply at least one part. One or more objective functions are selected. Each objective function has part variables, and each part variable represents a quantity of a part to be procured from a supplier. At least one constraint constraining at least one part variable is received. The one or more objective functions are optimized with respect to the at least one constraint to yield a value for each part variable. A quantity of each part to be procured from at least one supplier is determined according to the values to generate the optimized supplier allocation plan.

nplcit.text: Deb, Kalyanmoy, "Multi-Objective Optimization using Evolutionary Algorithms", 2001, John Wiley and Sons
